definition: outstanding heroes/warlords vying for supremacy (in former times)/stars (of sports or pop music)
group/crowd/flock, herd, pack etc
variant of 群[qun2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
great heroes pursue deer in the central plains (idiom); fig. many vie for supremacy

sentences.english: This film, a favorite with audiences, may be the most upbeat of the nominees.
sentences.chinese: 这部广受观众欢迎的影片，可能力挫群雄。

sentences.english: Which one not reaching the top of a successful person heart undoubtedly the swagger?
sentences.chinese: 哪一个登上成功顶峰的人心中没有傲视群雄的霸气？

sentences.english: There are sudden changes and powerful rivalries in Chinese television market.
sentences.chinese: 中国电视市场，群雄纷争，风起云涌。

sentences.english: A crowded Macy's department store in New York City the week before Christmas 1941.
sentences.chinese: 群雄梅西百货公司在纽约市的圣诞节前1941周。

sentences.english: In his semifinal bout Friday night, Zou showed a canny ability to work the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 在周五进行的半决赛中，邹就显示出力压群雄的实力。

sentences.english: Our product is in the lead in this industry.
sentences.chinese: 我们的产品在这个业界傲视群雄。

sentences.english: I take the world on the warlords of the hand, is not Yuanshi hands.
sentences.chinese: 朕取天下于群雄之手，不在元氏之手。

sentences.english: As yet, the market share of Microsoft has remained unrivalled among its competitors.
sentences.chinese: 迄今，微软的市场占有率依然傲视群雄。

definition: hero/towering figure
to pursue deer/fig. to vie for supremacy
to contend for supremacy
to inspire awe throughout the empire (idiom)
martial arts (social) circles
to inspire awe
great heroes pursue deer in the central plains (idiom); fig. many vie for supremacy
lit. fire beacons in all four directions (idiom); the confusion of war
to unify/unified
lit. hunting deer in the Central Plain (idiom)/fig. to attempt to seize the throne
powerful enemy
assemblage of talented individuals/ensemble of heroes
chief/first/brightest and best
prestige/renown/influence
to issue a call for action/to raise one's hand and issue a rousing call (idiom)
the task of establishing and maintaining hegemony
